title: Microsoft Corp. stock outperforms competitors on strong trading day
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.15%
       rose 1.86% to $382.77 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around great trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        -0.14%
       rising 0.57% to 4,783.45 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        -0.77%
       rising 0.45% to 37,695.73. This was the stock's third consecutive day of gains. Microsoft Corp. closed $1.53 below its 52-week high ($384.30), which the company achieved on November 29th. The stock outperformed some of its competitors Wednesday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        +0.53%
       rose 0.57% to $186.19, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +2.04%
       rose 0.87% to $143.80, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +2.15%
       rose 0.94% to $142.28. Trading volume (25.1 M) remained 734,437 below its 50-day average volume of 25.9 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use.
